languages.text: "Версерианы стоят под стражей прямо в тронном зале. Чую, еще немного и снова прольется чья-то кровь... Так увлекательно!"

traits.locale_text: "Версерианы стоят под стражей прямо в тронном зале. Чую, еще немного и снова прольется чья-то кровь... Так увлекательно!"

languages.text: "The Werserians are under guard in the throne room. My gut tells me more blood will be spilt again before long... How exciting!"
languages.original_text: "Версерианы стоят под стражей прямо в тронном зале. Чую, еще немного и снова прольется чья-то кровь... Так увлекательно!"

traits.locale_text: "The Werserians are detained right in the throne room. I have a feeling that someone's blood will be spilling again soon... So exciting!"
"The Werserians are detained right in the throne room. I have a feeling that someone's blood will be spilling again soon... So exciting!"
"The Werserians are detained right in the throne room. My gut tells me someone's blood will be spilling again in no time... So exciting!"
"The Werserians are detained right in the throne room. My gut tells me someone's blood will be spilling again in no time... So exciting!"
"The Werserians are under guard in the throne room. My gut tells me more blood will be spilled again before long... How exciting!"
"The Werserians are under guard in the throne room. My gut tells me more blood will be spilled again before long... How exciting!"

languages.text: 「ウェルザリアン家は玉座の間に拘束されています。これからもっと血が流れそうな予感がします…胸が躍りますね！」
languages.original_text: "The Werserians are under guard in the throne room. My gut tells me more blood will be spilt again before long... How exciting!"

traits.locale_text: 「ウェルザリアン家は玉座の間に拘束されています。これからもっと血が流れそうな予感がします…胸が躍りますね！」

languages.text: “韦尔森家族的人现在都被关进王座大厅了。我的直觉告诉我，一场流血势不可免……真令人兴奋！”
languages.original_text: "The Werserians are under guard in the throne room. My gut tells me more blood will be spilt again before long... How exciting!"

traits.locale_text: “韦尔森家族的人现在都被关进王座大厅了。我的直觉告诉我，一场流血势不可免……我好兴奋！”

languages.text: « Les Werserian sont sous surveillance dans la salle du trône. Quelque chose me dit que le sang ne va pas tarder à couler à nouveau... Comme c'est palpitant ! »
languages.original_text: "The Werserians are under guard in the throne room. My gut tells me more blood will be spilt again before long... How exciting!"

traits.locale_text: « Les Werserian sont retenus dans la salle du trône. Quelque chose me dit que le sang ne va pas tarder à couler à nouveau... Comme c'est palpitant ! »

languages.text: «Los Werserian se encuentran retenidos en la sala del trono. Algo me dice que dentro de poco se va a derramar sangre... ¡Qué emoción!».
languages.original_text: "The Werserians are under guard in the throne room. My gut tells me more blood will be spilt again before long... How exciting!"

traits.locale_text: «Los Werserian se encuentran detenidos en la sala del trono. Algo me dice que dentro de poco se va a derramar sangre... ¡Qué emoción!».

languages.text: "Die Werserians werden im Thronsaal bewacht. Mein Bauch sagt mir, dass bald noch mehr Blut fließen wird ... Wie aufregend!"
languages.original_text: "The Werserians are under guard in the throne room. My gut tells me more blood will be spilt again before long... How exciting!"

traits.locale_text: "Die Werserians stehen im Thronsaal unter Arrest. Mein Bauch sagt mir, dass bald wieder jemandes Blut fließt ... Wie aufregend!"

languages.text: "Werserianlar taht odasında tutuluyor. Üç vakte kadar burası yine kan gölüne dönecek. Amma heyecanlı!"
languages.original_text: "The Werserians are under guard in the throne room. My gut tells me more blood will be spilt again before long... How exciting!"

traits.locale_text: "Werserian hanesinin mensupları taht odasında tutuluyor. Pek yakında daha çok kan dökülecek gibi... Ay çok heyecanlı!"
